name: Catch all the Mosquitoes!
description:
Move:  Arrows / WASD 

(W= Forward / A= Left / S= Right / D= Back)

Look around: Mouse 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

To eat the mosquitoes run into them. Your bat will gobble them up. Make sure to eat all of the mosquitoes! Your bat needs to have a full stomach and keep the pest populations down :)
